TopicTitle: Dish Antennae don't seem to snap to inline attachment points any more

Articles.Content: RA-15, RA-2, Communotron 88-88, and RA-100 used to be able to snap to inline attach points in KSP1, but they don't seem able to in KSP2
You have to rotate the antennae first to the proper orientation, then it should snap to the right inline node.
